website_summaries.verdict: Rugged yet stylish automatic, self-wind watch with an attractive analog display.
pros: Clear face and anti-reflective sapphire dial window
cons: Deep-set face can be hard to read in the dark

customer_reviews.title: Superb Hamilton performer
customer_reviews.text: This is an elegant Hamilton workhorse -- tough and fine at the same time. Great for the office and serves well both for casual and semi-"dressy" (not too formal) occasions. Very accurate, too. Had absolutely no problems with it over the last 6+ years of almost daily wear (see pics of it after 6 years with no cleaning or any maintenance; sapphire crystal still unscratched). Highly recommended as a daily go-to timepiece.
customer_reviews.author: zts

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch, Great Value, it makes me happy :)
customer_reviews.text: This handsome Swiss automatic looks great and keeps accurate time too (something I can’t say about my other automatics). I’m too hard on wristwatches to ever spend thousands of dollars on one, so for the price, this is a great value. I love every aspect of this watch, from the color scheme to the day/date display, crystal back, second hand arrow, leather band etc. I wear it daily, and am noticing small s ratchets on the case around the crystal, proof that I’m too clumsy to own a high-priced luxury watch, so this is it for me. I refer to it often during the day because looking at it makes me happy - what else could I want?
customer_reviews.author: 8each8um

customer_reviews.title: Amazing watch!
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch! Wear it everyday to the office and on weekends. Goes well with almost any outift (minus a tux). I love the uniques day date placement. The size takes some getting used to if you normally wear larger watches. The face is made smaller by the bezel around the dial. But once you get used to it, its hard to wear anything larger. Best way to own a swiss automatic movement with a sapphire crystal. And yes the sapphire crystal holds up well against most dings and scratches. Wearing this watch everyday for the past 10 months means its been subjected to some normal and sometimes intense dings. But the crystal has remained spotless.
customer_reviews.author: Nabeel

customer_reviews.title: A Beautiful Watch and Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch. First week ran 2 seconds slow. That's a keeper for me. The black is REALLY black and the contrast with the numerals and hands is great. Nice hacking movement with tons of reserve. Quality strap. Honestly you can't go wrong with this watch. BTW it looks better than the picture. The picture looks to me like the whole case is brushed stainless but actually the top of the case surrounding the crystal is highly polished. This is my second Hamilton. My other is the Kahki Field Mechanical -- different movement (ETA) but it too has superb accuracy at 4 seconds per week.
customer_reviews.author: fastbyte22

customer_reviews.title: Very nice watch
customer_reviews.text: For the price point this is an extremely nice watch. The detail and print quality of the face is excellent. The band is nicely done. I wear this as my go to watch for around home and garage time. It is dressy enough to wear to dinner with the spousal unit. A very nice watch! (The one disappointment, was although the watch came inside a nicely made Hamilton box, there was no instructions, manual, or warranty card inside. For me this was disappointing, but I kept the watch nevertheless).
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Ghiglia

customer_reviews.title: I paired it with a 20mm Super Oyster watch band for an even more attractive looking ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very handsome watch and extraordinarily accurate for a watch in this price range. I paired it with a 20mm Super Oyster watch band for an even more attractive looking timepiece. It is a Hamilton, owned by the Swatch Group of Swiss watches and what more do you need to know? You can not go wrong for this price range. But if you like to spend $5,000 to $10,000 or more, go ahead; this one does everything you could ask and is fine looking to boot.
customer_reviews.author: T S Leighton

customer_reviews.title: Excellent watch!!
customer_reviews.text: I am more than pleased with this watch. The dimensions are perfect for my 6.75" wrist. I've changed out the band that came with it a couple of times. The leather band that is on it in the photos is way more comfortable than the factory one. Currently I have the NATO silver and black James Bond strap on it and it works well too. There is nothing I dislike about this watch. I highly recommend it if you have smaller wrists like mine.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Swiss made timepiece at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic Swiss made timepiece at a great price. Arrived quickly and packaged with care. I only wish that the product specs said more than "Men's standard," for band length. An actual measurement would be great for us gents with larger wrists and save some money on replacement straps. For reference for any future large wrist gentlemen, I swapped the included strap with this (I have an approx. 8.75" wrist) .  Keep up the great work.
customer_reviews.author: jason holmes

customer_reviews.title: My go-to watch for most occasions
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this watch. I've owned a couple of nice Seiko's, but this is easily my favorite watch. Keeps time within a few seconds a day, and the style is spot on for me. The attention to detail is excellent, and much of it is difficult to capture in a photo, even with a macro lens. I have fairly small wrists, and this watch fits me comfortably. The stock band is very nice and breaks in quickly. I also sometimes use a black nato strap, which looks great too. You can't go wrong with this thing. Even the case ages gracefully as it gets small scuffs and scratches from regular use.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Bratton

customer_reviews.title: Classic elegance
customer_reviews.text: I finally received the watch. Delivery was delayed and the vendor has agreed to reimburse my 2nd day shipping premium. This is a classic time piece. The Swiss movement is as precise as I had expected. Simple but elegant design. I think I like it more than my Tag Heuer that was three times the price and is a quartz movement. Glad I discovered Hamilton watches. A great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard To Beat
customer_reviews.text: Have Wanted To Own a Swiss Made Auto For A Long Time. But Have Not Been able To justify The Price Tag. I Was Delighted To Discover The Hamilton Khaki king. with its classic good looks, style And quality swiss Movement, Combined With Its Affordable Price Tag.This watch seemed Hard To Beat. I didnt know Much About The Hamiltons but After Reading all The Positive Reviews On This Site, Had No Choice But To Push The Buy Button. Have Had The Khaki King Only a Week, But Very very Happy with My Purchase And Would Highly Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Perfect starter Swiss Watch
customer_reviews.text: Amazing watch. Great value for a Swiss entry automatic time piece. Lighter then I thought, with an open caseback to view the movement. Mine DOES say Swiss made below the 6 o'clock number, and I'm super happy with that. Domed crystal and sweeping hand like most all Swiss watches. Classic time piece, VERY well made. Not sure if it's supposed to come with an ID/serial number card as mine didn't. Maybe it's because I ordered it from Amazon. Either way, still enjoy the watch and Hamilton packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful craftsmanship, average timekeeping
customer_reviews.text: As a Swiss-made Hamilton, it's certainly worth the price. Comfortable, well-balanced, beautifully designed. However, there are two things that surprised me: (1) Out of the box, it lost about 10-15 seconds per day. That's understandable, considering it's an automatic. But, I would have expected a bit more accuracy. (2) About four months after receiving it, I accidentally dropped it on a hard surface, cracking the crystal. After getting it back from Hamilton, the watch ran far more efficiently than before. Now, it loses only about 8-10 seconds a WEEK. Overall, I'm satisfied and would recommend it, considering the relatively low price-point.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B. Murray

customer_reviews.title: Be aware this is the new model with Powermatic movement
customer_reviews.text: I will not comment the quality of the watch as Hamlton stands behind it. However for all buyers be aware that the watch is with the customised ETA Powermatic 80 movement and not with the old ETA 2834.It seems Hamlton decided not use ETA 2834 and all new watches are with Powermatic, there is H on the rotor. There is enough information on the net for the cons and prons of Powermatic 80 caliber Vs the ETA 2834. After more than a month, additional feedback - the orginal strap is very stiff, so I replaced with softer one. The watch is very accurate, is loosing about 2 seconds/day. I'm more than happy with such results.
customer_reviews.author: Necho Marinov

customer_reviews.title: What's Not to Like?
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting a watch for some time but never knew enough about them to make a confident choice. So when I met a certified watch freak at a party I asked him which model he would recommend -- and it was this one. It ticks all the important boxes; Swiss mechanism, self-winding, sapphire crystal and stylish good looks. I went home and ordered mine the same night and I'm very satisfied with the purchase. The movement window on the back is a nice bonus too.
customer_reviews.author: overtoom

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch, I think I just got a defective product. Runs fast.
customer_reviews.text: The watch arrives quickly and it’s a good looking watch. The problem was that within 24 hours the watch was running nearly +30 seconds. I was not expecting perfection but I was expecting maybe 2-4 seconds per day.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great watch.
customer_reviews.text: So far, this has been a great watch. I really enjoy the look of it. It feels light on the wrist. The band is comfortable. I read some complaints about the lume not being very bright, or lasting long. It is bright enough for me, and lasts long enough for my needs. This is a great everyday watch for someone who wants a quality automatic, but not break the bank.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice watch for the money. I've had it for about a week and don't have anything to complain about. The dial is crisp, clear and very easy to read. My favorite feature is the full day display, kind of a unique feature. I'm going to put on a NATO strap, it should look sharp. The lum could be brighter for sure. But that's never been a big feature for me.
customer_reviews.author: bk from Texas

customer_reviews.title: My first automatic watch and it is very nice. It was smaller than I expected but I ...
customer_reviews.text: My first automatic watch and it is very nice. It was smaller than I expected but I actually like that it is small. Has been accurate but since I do not wear it every day I have to reset the time and wind it up every morning I use it
customer_reviews.author: sunnyvale_hh

customer_reviews.title: I love this watch
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch! The case itself is well made and it is really cool to be able to see the inter workings of the watch on the backside of the case. The leather strap is solid, well stitched and soft to the wrist on the inside. I can't wear my watch daily, so I have to set the date and time before I wear it quite often. I might recommend a battery or solar powered watch for someone that doesn't wear a watch everyday. I knew that this watch was an automatic when I purchased it, so this is not an issue for me. I hope to wear this watch for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: southernreader15

customer_reviews.title: Excellent timekeeping.
customer_reviews.text: This watch is exactly what my husband was looking for. Looks nice and is accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Gal

customer_reviews.title: Class
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch. Really classy and keeps accurate time. Has a decent power reserve when I switch it out for another watch.
customer_reviews.author: Larry L

customer_reviews.title: What a watch should be!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice , and Accurate! It is just as nice as the picture . Wish it would have come with a simple instruction on how to change the day of the week! ....If you go one way it would change date and the opposite way it change day of the week . My Son has been wearing it everyday since we got and Loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Fm

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch that keeps good time and at this price ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch that keeps good time and at this price I get a lot of compliments. People think it is much more expensive, I will wear it for decades.
customer_reviews.author: Paul B.

customer_reviews.title: Really nice.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and affordable piece. I swapped the leather band for black. Be advised the Hamilton black band is $150, which is nuts.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable watch ever.
customer_reviews.text: This is a tool watch but the polished bezel and crown combined with tasteful double domed crystal and it’s thin profile give it a classy look on the wrist. I love the day and date function at 12 o’clock. This is a classic beauty. Every collector would enjoy this piece.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff Squires

customer_reviews.title: Date can be hard to see. My wrist is 71/4 inches and I use 4th hole from end. May need a biggerstrap
customer_reviews.text: I like this watch very much for the price point. I have 2 Citizens and a Seiko Prospex and i like this watch above them all. At 40mm it is somewhat smaller than i am used to, but the longer i wear it the more i like it. Only thing I would change is a little more room for the date. Can be very hard to read. This is my first taste of a Swiss movement and function. Wow!! I may be in trouble now because it love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: One of the best values for your money
customer_reviews.text: Great watch! Classy without being pretentious. Can dress up or down.
customer_reviews.author: Nobody

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: Great looking watch, fits great, fast shipping. Just as described.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the watch
customer_reviews.text: I love the watch! Everything about it is perfect. The only downside is the see-through case back does not sport the sapphire crystal that the face does. It doesn't explicitly state this, so just be aware that the sapphire crystal is not on the case-back. Otherwise great watch! Keeps good time, a solid ETA movement, a quality handmade leather band, and a reasonable weight with the stainless steel case construction.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Trevalyan Stoakes

customer_reviews.title: Amazing watch
customer_reviews.text: I’ve wanted this watch for ten years. It’s amazing and perfect. Classy and understated I switched out the band for a nato band. Wish I had a job could have kept the original band it really pops
customer_reviews.author: rich hajt

customer_reviews.title: A great value.
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a affordable quality automatic watch, and after reading and watching many reviews, I decided on the Hamilton Khaki H64455533. After a few weeks of wearing this watch, I couldn't be happier with my choice. It is quality through and through, from the beautiful dial face to the soft leather band. A great value.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Trainor

customer_reviews.title: Looks way better in person
customer_reviews.text: Looks way better in person. The pictures I've found havent done it justice. Perfect daily watch for almost any occasion.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and tough
customer_reviews.text: It runs a little slow when not being worn. It loses 5seconds overnight but only loses a couple seconds during the day. Handsome and easy to read. Size is just right
customer_reviews.author: william fusselman

customer_reviews.title: GREAT WATCH FOR THE $
customer_reviews.text: Product appears to be new, never used. The band is comfortable but will be replaced as I like multiple band options with my watches. The watch is currently running about 2 seconds a day slow but is getting more accurate the more I wear it...2 seconds a day is totally acceptable fantastic in fact. Got it at a good price as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome watch
customer_reviews.text: Great watch! Looks awesome, good size, I really like having the day of the week up top. Easy to read. Leather strap looks and feels really nice. What a good swiss watch for a really good price. My watch runs 5 sec. fast a day. Movement lasts less than two days without wearing.
customer_reviews.author: michael hudgins

customer_reviews.title: Great Daily Watch
customer_reviews.text: I frequently get positive comments on this watch--it stands out a little, but not much, and it's very sturdily built. It's not comically oversized, like many other watches I've seen lately. It fits my hand without making me look like a doofus. My only complaint is that the band is a bit brighter than I would have chosen (a little red and vibrant), and so its best worn with casual clothes. That said, it certainly fits in the office if I wear the right belt.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Soyt

customer_reviews.title: Best field auto I own
customer_reviews.text: This particular day date mechanism is a nice touch, not a distraction. The lume is good, not great, for the small area painted. The leather band is sturdy and the clasp is very well made. The dial is clean and very attractive. Given that this is an ETA 2834 movement I cant think of a reason NOT to buy this watch. If you are looking for a Hamilton auto and don't want a chrono, buy this watch and in 10 years when they are rare treat your still ticking Hamilton field auto a new leather strap.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: The leather strap is a bit rough but it is breaking in nicely in my wrist
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wanting this watch for years. The packaging was a little worn, but the watch was in pristine conditions. The leather strap is a bit rough but it is breaking in nicely in my wrist. Beautiful watch for a day to day use. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: lihuecz

customer_reviews.title: Leather strap is unbelievably hard and stiff.
customer_reviews.text: I returned this one and opted for the steel bracelet version. Reason: the leather strap was just too hard and stiff. Be aware of this before purchasing. It was very uncomfortable to wear. I understand there is a break-in period but this strap would have never worked for me. Watch itself is excellent and five stars (read my other review of bracelet version).
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Chungus

customer_reviews.title: Nothing bad to say :)
customer_reviews.text: It was the Christmas present for my husband. He is super happy and loves it. The watch was delivered way faster, than it was supposed to. And the package was really good. No problems at all. The watch itself has a really good quality.

customer_reviews.title: Great anniversary gift
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my husband for our first wedding anniversary. I wanted to give him a classy, timeless watch that was high quality...He wanted a watch the was featured on his favorite show, House MD. This fit the bill for both of us, and he not only loves it but gets lots of compliments on it. Good buy, good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Chele O'Sully

customer_reviews.title: Next to my Seiko 007
customer_reviews.text: Good watch for price although it is small with no screw in crown.It has a nice crystal and hacking. I don't like the second hand or the bezel. Good casual watch.
customer_reviews.author: ed sanders

customer_reviews.title: Great watch and a great value.
customer_reviews.text: The moment you take the Hamilton Khaki king out of its box you can feel the difference getting a quality watch gives. From its sturdy construction to it's great design it is plain that you are getting a lot of watch for your dollar. My only complaint would be that the polished bezel does scratch easily, as others have noted. Other than that this item still looks like new after a couple weeks of almost daily use. Great addition to any watch collection.
customer_reviews.author: Tom M.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: To the people saying they received a fake, rest assured it's just the newer model of the same watch. Hamilton has been switching out the movements on their newer models and have been slow to update their website.
customer_reviews.author: Jon the Pilot

customer_reviews.title: Excellent time piece!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent watch...have only had for short time but really nice looking and keeping good time.
customer_reviews.author: MSE

customer_reviews.title: The watch is excellent. Has the look of a Breitling or an ...
customer_reviews.text: The watch is excellent. Has the look of a Breitling or an Oris watch. It does state at the bottom of the dial that it is Swiss Made. The day/date feature is nice as well. Watch is well made and the leather strap is very good. Watch is well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D Magill

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous watch, looks just like the picture. I’m very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Eve Cal

customer_reviews.title: Truly Beautiful Watch for Unbeatable Price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for my husband as a christmas gift. He is a leathersmith and works with his hands all day and he's pretty hard on things, but this watch will stand up to that test. The construction is great, very high quality - its exactly as advertized - a genuine Hamilton Khaki King. You can't get this quality at this price. He LOVES it and I love the history, name and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Punches way above it's weight.
customer_reviews.text: Pics don't do this piece justice. Attention to detail is stellar! Strap does take some time to break in.
customer_reviews.author: AJ Nidek

customer_reviews.title: Great watch.
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch. I’ve owned it for 5 years, and put it through some pretty major abuse. It’s held up great, and still keeps great time.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: King khaki Wow
customer_reviews.text: This watch has become my number one to wear you can’t beat it love it
customer_reviews.author: Boomer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Superb watch. I highly recommend this watch. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: M Gary

customer_reviews.title: Buy it.
customer_reviews.text: This watch is very nice for anyone who is looking for a classy yet casual watch. I like how it is an automatic and therefore the second hand does not click like quartz watches. The band is high quality and the crown easy to manipulate. The watch has glow in the dark paint which is easily readable. I love it. When it shipped to me it had an imperfection, a tiny piece of dust under the hour hand however I called amazon and they replaced it within two days. Super easy and fast. The new one is absolutely perfect! if you're contemplating getting a stupid nixon watch don't; a Hamilton is a classic.
customer_reviews.author: lv3n3wb

customer_reviews.title: Good watch, but not my style
customer_reviews.text: I have several Hamilton automatics, and I did like this one, but I returned it. It was slightly too small on my wrist and the smooth bezel seemed a little plain.
customer_reviews.author: Mac Guy

customer_reviews.title: Classy!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the classy astetic of this watch. It's well made. My only complaint is that it's smaller than expected. My other watches are >40mm so perhaps it's just a matter of getting use to it.
customer_reviews.author: Kurtiss Bialoruski

customer_reviews.title: Great Hamilton watch!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing value for an incredible watch! The movement and exhibition back make this worth more than the price. Its beautiful to watch this in action. Leather strap is incredibly high quality!
customer_reviews.author: bliss1221

customer_reviews.title: Amazing watch worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This beauty came in earlier than anticipated and was 100% perfect. Great watch. Very sturdy box with warranty card. I won't be taking it off for a while.
customer_reviews.author: John Tomlinson

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolutely beautiful watch. Pure, simple design, the detailing on the watch-face looks fantastic. It actually feels a little smaller than I expected based on the pictures - the fairly wide bezel probably makes the watch face - and therefore the whole watch feel a little smaller than my other 40mm ones - but nevertheless perfect size, even if you have a smaller wrist. Great materials and build quality.
customer_reviews.author: Gab

customer_reviews.title: I enjoyed this watch for about 2 weeks now and loved ...
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed this watch for about 2 weeks now and loved every second of it. However my only disappointment was the packaging, not a huge problem but the box seemed to have been knocked around a lot before I received the watch.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Gresh

customer_reviews.title: Shipped fast
customer_reviews.text: The watch was received quickly and as advertised. Very pleased with the watch and the purchase experience.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Toughest watch in my collection
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic Swiss movement , I’ve had it for over three weeks and still showing perfect time , it truly is king
customer_reviews.author: Gene A.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great Watch, I have not taken it off since I bought it. I was a little worried it did not had the Swiss Made at 6 o'clock since it was not showing in the product pictures, but it does. The seller was great as well, it arrived on time, well packaged and as described. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, on-time delivery, makes a great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this with expedited shipping before Christmas and it arrived on-time and in the box with all the papers as described. The watch itself was in excellent condition: plastic face protection still on the watch face, the watch band was obviously never worn. My husband was overjoyed! He's been wearing the watch since Christmas day, and has had no issues. Would order again from this vendor.
customer_reviews.author: MomOf2

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a great field watch for the price. The band feels high quality and has stitching. It feels well made and keeps time accurately. I'd say it work works as good as my great grandfather's 1966 Hamilton Thin o matic. Only this one I don't have to wind up every day.
customer_reviews.author: PMJ

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described/reviewed by other posters and seller. Showing ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described/reviewed by other posters and seller. Showing "Swiss Made" at the bottom indicating it is a 2016 watch and not older models.
customer_reviews.author: ARBee

customer_reviews.title: Great watch and comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: Great watch and comfortable to wear. Leather strap is premium and well made. Dial is easy to read and the sapphire crystal makes it hard to scratch. Keeps great time and looks fantastic, too.
customer_reviews.author: Alan K. McCall

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch
customer_reviews.text: Great looking watch...dress it up or dress it down...it fits the occasion.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel R Carter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wish the leather was of better quality but otherwise it's a fine timepiece for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good experience here in Italy with king hamilton
customer_reviews.text: The article arrived as usual early and without any troubles (I'm in italy) it was in line with my espectation good box good watch and till now (after two days of use) it seems that it runs well too. In case of negative events I'll keep you early informed .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect watch for the perfect partner
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this watch, as it is comfortable, easy to set (if needed), elegant. Hamiltons have been great watches for a long time. This is a perfect anniversary gift for someone who loves traditional watches.
customer_reviews.author: lisa Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Very nicewatch. Great brand with a great tradition
customer_reviews.text: Very nice watch. Great brand with a great tradition. Large and easy to read face with illuminated hands, sweeping second hand, date and day display that are all easy on the eyes. The leather band is a lighter shade of brown than depicted in picture but this is now my favorite watch.
customer_reviews.author: jim c.

customer_reviews.title: An incredible value, this timepiece is a flawlessly made ...
customer_reviews.text: An incredible value, this timepiece is a flawlessly made mid-size watch with a classic look. I'm very impressed with the quality, especially given the price. My Seamasters will be doing some drawer time.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne A. Francis

customer_reviews.title: Hamilton is the Best of them all!
customer_reviews.text: Wish I would have purchased this watch earlier in my collection, because it is the best watch I own. I've had it for 1 week....that is all I need to know. I have 2Luminox, 2Citizen, Seiko, 2Victorinox(second favorite). Khaki King field watch....Hamilton is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit for me in all respects ... great look. Above all keeps good time.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Valaris

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch at Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I really like Hamilton's current line of watches, and own two Hamilton automatics. The Khaki King is a really nice watch, it features a Swiss ETA movement, quality leather band, observation back, and is not as flashy as many fashionable oversized watches. The day display is a nice and fairly unusual feature.
customer_reviews.author: Bo Reeto

customer_reviews.title: I really like the overall look and function
customer_reviews.text: I really like the overall look and function. My first automatic watch. I did have to return this watch do to it stopping altogether while on my wrist after about a month of use. I am on my second watch, hope it last longer. Would have given five stars if the first one hadn't broke. I did like it so much that I gave it a second chance though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch it's got the classic look and is very rugged
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: My first lol
customer_reviews.text: Damn its a nice watch. If you want to buy your first automatic I think this one is the one. Pretty much all I have to say since I cant pretend like Im a watch expert so Im going to stay in my lane cheers!
customer_reviews.author: Trudcuff

customer_reviews.title: Stunning
customer_reviews.text: Stunning watch and perfect entry into automatics. I purchased this as a gift for my husband and he loves it. It pairs well dressed up or when he's in casual.
customer_reviews.author: Andres

customer_reviews.title: Hamilton
customer_reviews.text: Stunning. A work of precision art. Just beautiful. A fine instrument.
customer_reviews.author: Ron L

customer_reviews.title: A very nice watch (better with a black band).
customer_reviews.text: I really like this watch. It is my dress watch. The band was way too small for my massive wrist, but I ordered a XXL one and it works great. ...also, it looks better with a black band.
customer_reviews.author: Anonamousity

customer_reviews.title: Excellent wrist watch for the price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, delivered as mentioned. Seems to be gaining few seconds each day. Still a wonderful wrist watch for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sai Achanta

customer_reviews.title: It’s so damn cool lookin on my wrist
customer_reviews.text: It’s so damn cool lookin on my wrist, but I guess I’m kinda biased. I was hesitant to spend the extra money to step up from my Seiko 5, but I couldn’t be happier. 4 months in its +3 seconds per day.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality and exquisite Timepiece
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Quality and exquisite Timepiece!!! The only thing that bothered me a bit was...No cert of Authenticity with this Watch..
customer_reviews.author: adrian almeida

customer_reviews.title: but I am happy with it
customer_reviews.text: It works perfectly. It does seem to be a little fast, but I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: M.M.

customer_reviews.title: Classic Hamilton
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Hamilton watch. And once again, a superb product. I have nothing but good words for it. Consider the price, this is a quality piece and are as good as many other watches that are much more expensive. The real watch looks even better than the picture! Buy one and you will not regret it!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Precise and solid. Well done
customer_reviews.text: No complains. It just works. Works as it should. Sharp and precise. If you are wearing this watches every day-just forget about turn on your spring. Looks very solid and attractive. For those, who understand the sense of real mechanic movement. Seconds pointer is sexy) Its only takes to change the bend once per year if yours is made of leather. Good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Dmitry

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect! The strap feels a bit plastic but I ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect! The strap feels a bit plastic but I knew I was going to change out to nato straps. Can't stop staring at this watch!
customer_reviews.author: daniel

customer_reviews.title: Yes .. nice
customer_reviews.text: So far a really nice auto watch. Lost 2 seconds in two days, according to the national atomic clock app.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Brown

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and affordable watch, with just a couple of notes to be aware of
customer_reviews.text: This watch is a great addition to a timepiece collection. It is affordable, stylish and can be "dressed up" or "dressed down" depending on the occasion. The numbers are easy to read for those of us creeping up on the need for reading glasses and the black dial with white numbers provides a nice contrast. The band is comfortable, though it does take a few days to break in. The last loop is a bit loose and does not seem to stay where placed. You should also note this is a "self winding" watch, so having it on your night stand for a couple of days will require it to be reset with the time and date.
customer_reviews.author: K. Min

customer_reviews.title: Would highly recommend to anyone great everyday watch
customer_reviews.text: Would highly recommend to anyone great everyday watch! Keep accurate time at -1 sec per day. Can't say enough about about this piece.
customer_reviews.author: Devon

customer_reviews.title: Great watch!
customer_reviews.text: Too small for my wrist. I gave it a shot. Looks amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Hector

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully constructed time piece. It is accurate with only a +2 second gain per day. Very comfortable on the wrist.
customer_reviews.author: gregg a mcbride

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: nice swiss watch - I put a different band because I need long
customer_reviews.author: JJT

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Keeping time like a chronograph +- about 4 seconds each day. Great looking and rugged.
customer_reviews.author: G F  Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Awesome wach
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. The day of the week is a unique feature and it helps when working night shift at work.You definitely get the feeling when holding or wearing the watch that it will last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Murphy

customer_reviews.title: I received what I initially thought was a fake
customer_reviews.text: I received what I initially thought was a fake from Watchsavings. I was worried about getting a fake like another review on Amazon, so I bought the exact same watch from Macy's. But now I don't think I received a fake Hamilton watch. The watch is exactly the same in every way except the "H" on the weight, and the band says "Handcrafted leather". I took a picture of the differences. It seems that Hamilton makes a slightly different version of the watch without a manufacturer's warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazingwatch. Rugged
customer_reviews.text: Amazing watch. Rugged, simple, while still being somewhat elegant. Very accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan Esmundo

customer_reviews.title: Love it for accuracy
customer_reviews.text: May be I am lucky one, but my Hamilton Men's H64455533 Khaki King is extremely accurate beast (less than -3 sec for last 5 days). Love it for accuracy. Overall it is a very good casual watch.
customer_reviews.author: VLADIMIR RODIONOV

product_meta.title: Hamilton Men's H64455533 Khaki King Series Stainless Steel Automatic Watch with Brown Leather Band
product_meta.description:
Stainless steel case with a brown croc-embossed leather bracelet with contrast stitching. Fixed stainless steel bezel. Black dial with luminous hands and Arabic numeral hour markers. Minute markers around the outer rim. GMT scale. Luminescent hands and markers. Day and date display at the 12 o'clock position. Automatic movement. Scratch resistant synthetic sapphire crystal. Protected steel crown. Skeleton case back. Case diameter: 40 mm. Case thickness: 11 mm. Tang clasp. Water resistant at 50 meters / 165 feet. Functions: hours/ minutes/ seconds/ day and date. Hamilton Khaki King Series Men's Watch H64455533.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :5.91 x 5.91 x 5.91 inches; 2.56 Ounces
 * Item model number :H64455533
 * Department :Mens
 * Batteries :1 Unknown batteries required.
 * Date First Available :June 1, 2004
 * Manufacturer :Hamilton
 * ASIN :B000AONZWQ

Black dial with luminous hands and Arabic numeral hour markers. Minute markers around the outer rim. GMT scale. Luminescent hands and markers. Day and date display at the 12 o'clock position. Automatic movement. Scratch resistant synthetic sapphire crystal. Protected steel crown. Skeleton case back. Case diameter: 40 mm. Case thickness: 11 mm. Tang clasp. Water resistant at 50 meters / 165 feet. Functions: hours/ minutes/ seconds/ day and date. Hamilton Khaki King Series Men's Watch H64455533.
feature_bullets: Stainless steel watch featuring round black dial with day/date display at 12 o'clock, sword-shape hands, and 24-hour time on inner dial
40 mm stainless steel case with anti-reflective sapphire dial window
Automatic self-wind movement with analog display
Leather band with contrast stitching and buckle closure
Water resistant to 50 m (165 ft): In general, suitable for short periods of recreational swimming, but not diving or snorkeling
